about.summary: pylint-django is a Pylint plugin to aid Pylint in recognising and understandingerrors caused when using the Django framework

name: pylint-django
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "pylint-django" %}
{% set version = "0.7.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "b8e51d6b694401e23040ddafc3a4c7da92faaa1718b007ad66aa36e40ec84506" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - pylint-plugin-utils >=0.2.1
    - pylint >=1.0

test:
  imports:
    - pylint_django
    - pylint_django.augmentations
    - pylint_django.checkers
    - pylint_django.transforms

about:
  home: https://github.com/landscapeio/pylint-django
  license: GPL 2
  summary: pylint-django is a Pylint plugin to aid Pylint in recognising and understandingerrors caused when using the Django framework

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham

about.summary: pylint-django is a Pylint plugin to aid Pylint in recognising and understandingerrors caused when using the Django framework
